location: Xingnan Street, Nangang District - Qingtian Forest building, near MRT (within 200m of 3 stations)
notes: Modern 2BR apartment on 24th floor with contemporary furnishings, river views, and full appliances including washer, AC, and gas cooking. High floor with balcony - parents with baby should verify balcony railing height and safety. Building has elevator, parking, and is near elementary school (231m). Clean, well-maintained unit with good natural light from high floor position.
